description: Installation of extraction ducting from ground floor to roof level on the rear wall of the property.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Unnumbered Site Location Plan;  SP/B362; Unnumbered A4 roof plan; Unnumbered sketch of duct;  Unnumbered A4 sheet of details of extract system; Noise curves for MFW HELIOS 500/4-based extract system.   A4 detail sheet for Arya wire mesh grease filters;   Detail sheet 2424-7C for Arya carbon filter; A4 basement and ground floor layout sheet.  A4 basement and ground floor layout (Plan 1).  13 x photo sheets.  Design and Access Statement.  (LBI REG: 04901)

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
